version.description: The version number of the settings in SemVer format

enabled.description: Will disable all notifications if false

newCollaborator.description: Notification setting for new collaborator event

notify.description: Indicates if the user should be notified when new a user joins a folder as a collaborator

onlyCollaboratorsInvitedByMe.description: Indicates if the user should be notified when new a user joins a folder as a collaborator ONLY if the collaborator was invited by user

updated.description: Indicates if the user should be notified on new folder updated events

bookmarksAdded.description: Indicates if the user should be notified when bookmarks are added to folder

bookmarksRemoved.description: Indicates if the user should be notified when bookmarks are removed from folder

collaboratorExit.description: Notification setting for when a user leaves a folder as a collaborator

notify.description: Indicates if the user should be notified when a user leaves a folder as a collaborator

onlyWhenCollaboratorHasWritePermission.description: Indicates the user should be notified only if user has write permission
